script.zh: 今天我们说一下家人。你家有几口人？矮中，你先。
script.en: Today we're talking about family. How many people are in your family? 矮中, you first.

script.zh: 我家有五口人！爸爸、妈妈、两个哥哥、还有我。我爸是牙医，我妈是护士。我们是Ohio的！
script.en: Five people in my family! Dad, mom, two older brothers, and me. My dad's a dentist, my mom's a nurse. We're from Ohio!

script.zh: 我家有四口人。我爸做金融，我妈也做金融。我弟弟在英国读寄宿学校。
script.en: Four people. My dad works in finance, my mom also works in finance. My little brother goes to boarding school in England.

script.zh: 三个人。我爸、我妈、还有我。我们住在台北。我爸做小生意。我妈——我妈做的卤肉饭是全台北最好吃的。不对，是全台湾最好吃的。你们知道卤肉饭吗？那是台湾的national dish——
script.en: Three people. My dad, my mom, and me. We live in Taipei. My dad runs a small business. My mom — my mom makes the best braised pork rice in all of Taipei. No wait, the best in all of Taiwan. Do you guys know braised pork rice? It's Taiwan's national dish —
Can you not bring up Taiwan?
I'm talking about my mom's cooking!

script.zh: 我妈住在台湾，她做的菜在台湾，所以——
script.en: My mom lives in Taiwan, her cooking is in Taiwan, so —

script.zh: 我家是广东的。你有没有看到我每五秒钟提一次广东？
script.en: I'm from Guangdong. Do you see me bringing up Guangdong every five seconds?
小黑, tell us about your family?

script.zh: 两个人。我跟我妈。我爸……在。理论上在。他一直出差。从小就出差。我不太知道他做什么。我妈在家。她是"网红"。
script.en: Two people. Me and my mom. My dad... exists. Theoretically. He's always on business trips. Has been since I was little. I don't really know what he does. My mom stays home. She's an "influencer."

script.zh: 就那种……两百个粉丝、假装有二十万粉丝的那种。她发不是她做的菜的照片，住不起的酒店的照片。反正她很忙。
script.en: The kind with... two hundred followers pretending she has two hundred thousand. She posts photos of food she didn't cook, hotels she can't afford. Anyway, she's very busy.

script.zh: 我爸妈离婚了。我爸是美国人。我妈是中国人。我跟我爸住。我跟我妈……不太……
script.en: My parents are divorced. My dad's American. My mom's Chinese. I live with my dad. Me and my mom... don't really...
Let me also share about my family —

script.zh: 好吧。但是既然大家都分享了——我也离婚了。没有小孩。一个人住。
script.en: Fair enough. But since everyone shared — I'm also divorced. No kids. Live alone.
Teacher, why did you come to China?

script.zh: 我说了。因为我爱这个文化。
script.en: I told you. Because I love the culture.

script.zh: 那你说了。但是你为什么留下来了？
script.en: Yeah, you said that. But why did you stay?

script.zh: 小李的家庭情况也比较私人。你还是问了。
script.en: 小李's family situation is also pretty personal. You still asked.
怪老师 has nothing to say.

grammarNotes.title: 有/没有 — to have / to not have
grammarNotes.body:
我家有五口人。
我没有哥哥。
你有没有兄弟姐妹？

Note: 有 的否定是 没有，不是 ~~不有~~

grammarNotes.title: 几 vs 多少 — how many?
grammarNotes.body:
你家有几口人？（less than 10, use 几）
你有多少粉丝？（could be a lot, use 多少）

grammarNotes.title: 的 — possession / description
grammarNotes.body:
我妈做的卤肉饭 = the braised pork rice my mom makes
不是她做的菜 = food she didn't cook
台湾发明的 = invented by Taiwan

grammarNotes.title: 又...了 — "again"
grammarNotes.body:
小黑：你又提台湾了！= You mentioned Taiwan AGAIN!
Note: 又 for past events that happened again. 再 for future.

cultureNotes.title: 中国的家庭 (Chinese Family)
cultureNotes.body: In China, you count family members with 口 (kǒu): 我家有五口人. The one-child policy (1979–2015) means most young adults are 独生子女 (only children). Family terms are hyper-specific — not just 'uncle' but 伯伯 (dad's older brother), 叔叔 (dad's younger brother), 舅舅 (mom's brother). Parents remain deeply involved in their children's lives well into adulthood — weekly phone calls are the bare minimum.

cultureNotes.title: 网红文化
cultureNotes.body: 在中国，"网红"无处不在。有真的网红（几百万粉丝），也有假的网红（几百个粉丝但假装很红）。小黑的妈妈就是后者。这在中国很普遍——很多人在社交媒体上假装自己的生活比实际的好。中文叫"装"。
